title.rendered: Balogun Market, Location, Market Days, Parks and Shipments, Products

content.rendered:
Balogun market is popular in Lagos, Nigeria. The market was created in 2019 near Lagos Island, Nigeria. This market serves as a significant hub for products such as wholesale clothing materials, electronics, jewelry, beverages, oil imports and exports, and so much more.

Location

The Balogun Market is located near Lagos Island, Nigeria. It spread across many streets concatenated in Eko region, selling different outstanding products such as fabrics, wares, shoes, foodstuffs, electronics, and lots more. In the market, many partners have come together as supermarkets. The Balogun market is situated in the four corners of Ojokoro, Agbede, Ikorodu, Victoria Island, and Snake Island.

Market Days

There is no specific day for this market. It is advisable to find out if your seller is actually open for operations.

Parks and Shipments

If you are a regular buyer in the Balogun market, finding the right shipping options may be easier. Although the market operates in a truck-based systems where truck agents push parcels to the nearest Park. popular Parks near Balogun market includes UBA park, Balogun street park.

To Ship goods to your location, it is important to engage the truck pusher to ship products to the nearby transport agency.

Products

In Balogun Market, different assorted products are sold including, foodstuffs, Clothes, Electronics, wares, and lots

Balogun Market, Clothing Side
